0: Other than that the room was fine
I had called 4 times to confirm a King room with a Strip view
The shower was huge but I mostly used the very relaxing tub
Bulb had gone in the shower which must of been noticed by the cleaner before we checked in but it took 3 days to get it changed
There is no room in the fridge for your own beverages
This resulted in a couple of late night bathroom trip blinding moments
It has a fully stocked fridge freezer and a microwave but no coffee maker
Bathroom was nice but who needs a tub
Certain things that I thought was odd was the microwave in the room but no dishes to heat or warm your food on and no cofemaker and coffee
Maybe it ’s generational but both the rooms housekeeping and the bar wait staff were not taken care of
1: We got a corner suite with fountain view

Our studio suite had a nice big floor plan lovely large bathroom comfy living room with sectional sofa big desk kitchen King bed lovely balcony with chair and view of The Strip and famous fountains at La Belagio
Location laundry room pool good room design
Nice hotel the rooms are well furnished
We booked a 5night stay in a Terrace Fountain room overlooking the Belagio fountain
Our room was upgraded without asking
The pools are a really great place to relax and also have strip views
The overall experience for location the balcony was excellent
Finally we got a new room card
We love the Cosmo for the view the terrace affords us but this was more than we hoped for
